type-of-change.name: style
type-of-change.title: Styles
type-of-change.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

type-of-change.name: refactor
type-of-change.title: Code Refactoring
type-of-change.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

type-of-change.name: perf
type-of-change.title: Performance Improvements
type-of-change.description: A code change that improves performance

type-of-change.name: test
type-of-change.title: Tests
type-of-change.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

type-of-change.name: build
type-of-change.title: Builds
type-of-change.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

type-of-change.name: ci
type-of-change.title: Continuous Integrations
type-of-change.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

type-of-change.name: chore
type-of-change.title: Chores
type-of-change.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
